subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: The latest round of indictments in the growing scandal enveloping the soccer world has sent shock waves through soccer heavyweights like Brazil and Argentina as well as smaller countries like Guatemala and Costa Rica.
snippet: The latest round of indictments in the growing scandal enveloping the soccer world has sent shock waves through soccer heavyweights like Brazil and Argentina as well as smaller countries like Guatemala and Costa Rica.
